opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William J. Cressler, Harrisburg, for PENDOT.

Jane M. Shields, Exton, for Cherry Tp. and Dale Fitzgerald et al.
